attributes.action: Stop MP's claiming Parliamentary Privilege to avoid Criminal Prosecutions in the current 'expenses scandal'
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
MP's of any party should not be above the law. Any member of the public found to be claiming monies incorrectly is liable to prosecution, which may result in a fine or even imprisonment.
The Government of the day makes the laws - they are NOT above it

rejection.details: This is a matter for direct communication with Parliament.
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
